SQL.LOAD: SELECT question_list_id, issue_question_id, display_order, effective, expiration, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, issue_question_list_id FROM elp_issue_question_list WHERE issue_question_list_id = :issue_question_list_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT question_list_id, issue_question_id, display_order, effective, expiration, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by, issue_question_list_id FROM elp_issue_question_list WHERE question_list_id = :question_list_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_issue_question_list SET question_list_id = :question_list_id, issue_question_id = :issue_question_id, display_order = :display_order, effective = :effective, expiration = :expiration, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE issue_question_list_id = :issue_question_list_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_issue_question_list ( question_list_id, issue_question_id, display_order, effective, expiration, created_by, issue_question_list_id ) VALUES ( :question_list_id, :issue_question_id, :display_order, :effective, :expiration, :created_by, :issue_question_list_id )
SQL.GetSelectedDealerList: SELECT LTRIM(RTRIM(DEALER_NAME)) DESCRIPTION, DEALER_ID ID FROM ELP_DEALER
SQL.SEARCH_Question_List_Selected: SELECT EIQL.issue_question_id ID, EI.description || ' - ' || ESQ.description DESCRIPTION FROM ELP_ISSUE_QUESTION_LIST EIQL INNER JOIN ELP_ISSUE_QUESTION EIQ ON EIQL.issue_question_id = EIQ.issue_question_id INNER JOIN ELP_ISSUE EI ON EIQ.issue_id = EI.issue_id INNER JOIN ELP_SOFT_QUESTION ESQ ON EIQ.soft_question_id = ESQ.soft_question_id WHERE EIQL.question_list_id = :question_list_id AND (SELECT SYSDATE FROM DUAL) BETWEEN EIQL.EFFECTIVE AND EIQL.EXPIRATION ORDER BY EIQL.display_order
SQL.ISSUE_QUESTION_EXPIRATION: SELECT EXPIRATION FROM ELITA.ELP_ISSUE_QUESTION WHERE ISSUE_QUESTION_ID=:ISSUE_QUESTION_ID
SQL.QUESTION_LIST: SELECT ISSUE_QUESTION_ID FROM ELITA.ELP_ISSUE_QUESTION_LIST WHERE QUESTION_LIST_ID=:QUESTION_LIST_ID AND EXPIRATION > SYSDATE
SQL.QUESTION_IN_LIST: SELECT SOFT_QUESTION_ID FROM ELITA.ELP_ISSUE_QUESTION WHERE ISSUE_ID=:ISSUE_ID AND EXPIRATION > SYSDATE
SQL.DEALER_LIST: SELECT DEALER_ID ID FROM ELITA.ELP_DEALER WHERE QUESTION_LIST_CODE = :QUESTION_LIST_CODE
SQL.IS_CHILD: SELECT issue_question_list_id FROM elita.elp_issue_question_list WHERE issue_question_id = :issue_question_id AND question_list_id = :question_list_id
SQL.SAVE_DEALER_LIST: UPDATE ELITA.ELP_DEALER SET QUESTION_LIST_CODE=:QUESTION_LIST_CODE WHERE DEALER_ID = :DEALER_ID
